Title: All About Her
Writer: Neil Gaiman (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Tom Kapinos (developed by), Alex Katsnelson, Chris Rafferty (executive story editor), Mike Costa (executive story editor), Julia Fontana (story editor)
Actors: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, Tricia Helfer
Plot: Lucifer tries to earn Chloe's assistance in his investigation of Pierce. Meanwhile, Amenadiel deals with a personal health issue.
